examples.description: returns zero for the rate and EXEMPT as the status
examples.full_description: LineItem#calculate_vat_status when the sales tax is VAT when the sales tax rate is Exempt returns zero for the rate and EXEMPT as the status

examples.description: returns zero for the rate and ZERO as the status
examples.full_description: LineItem#calculate_vat_status when the sales tax is VAT when the sales tax rate is zero returns zero for the rate and ZERO as the status

examples.description: returns zero for the rate and REDUCED as the status
examples.full_description: LineItem#calculate_vat_status when the sales tax is VAT when the sales tax rate matches the reduced rate returns zero for the rate and REDUCED as the status

examples.description: returns zero for the rate and STANDARD as the status
examples.full_description: LineItem#calculate_vat_status when the sales tax is VAT when the sales tax rate is any other rate returns zero for the rate and STANDARD as the status

examples.description: is returns the rate and OUT_OF_SCOPE as the status
examples.full_description: LineItem#calculate_vat_status when the sales tax is not VAT is returns the rate and OUT_OF_SCOPE as the status

examples.description: returns nil
examples.full_description: LineItem#sales_tax_status when sales tax is NOT relevant returns nil

examples.description: returns :exempt
examples.full_description: LineItem#sales_tax_status when sales tax is relevant when the parent involves sales tax when the rate is exempt returns :exempt

examples.description: returns :taxable
examples.full_description: LineItem#sales_tax_status when sales tax is relevant when the parent involves sales tax when the rate is any other value returns :taxable

examples.description: returns :out_of_scope
examples.full_description: LineItem#sales_tax_status when sales tax is relevant when the parent does NOT involve sales tax returns :out_of_scope

examples.description: returns nil
examples.full_description: LineItem#second_sales_tax_status when second sales tax is NOT relevant returns nil

examples.description: returns :taxable
examples.full_description: LineItem#second_sales_tax_status when second sales tax is relevant when the parent involves second sales tax returns :taxable

examples.description: returns :out_of_scope
examples.full_description: LineItem#second_sales_tax_status when second sales tax is relevant when the parent does NOT involve sales tax returns :out_of_scope
